channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Donation Thermometer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Donation Thermometer

item.title: CVE-2022-3128|2024-08-03T01:00:10.523Z -- unknown -- donation%20thermometer
item.description: The Donation Thermometer WordPress plugin before 2.1.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
